name: The Tree of Life
description:
A small game about emotional power and motherly love, created as a part of Guildford Game Jam 2018: Power.

Developed with the kind effort, blood, sweat and tears of :
Ioana Iulia Cazacu

Mike Everett

Dave Allen

Alex Jones

Lorraine Ansell

Lucho Hubanov

(Pending post-Jam update and cleanup)

Controls:

WASD/Arrows for movement,

Space to collect energy,

Left Alt for interactions with others and world  tree
